Review.Titre: I made a re-charge for a phone in …
Review.Contenu: I made a re-charge for a phone in Mexico for 10 dollars. The USD-Peso rate was 20 pesos for every 1 USD. This company only gave me 15 pesos for each dollar. I never had the time to check. This is my last time using this service

Strongly advise you avoid these people. When you go to recharge your mobile, they give you an exchange rate almost double the actual one (MXN 33,30 to $1 versus current MXN 18.85 to $1). When you use the online chat to ask them how it is you're getting MXN 389 credit for $10 instead of MXN 188 or so, they keep repeating that it's an ESTIMATE. When you push them to know what you'll ACTUALLY be getting before you hand over your money, the chat gets cut off.  This happened twice to me (talking to Mauricio) after he just kept repeating it's a computer estimate without explaining how the estimate is double the real rate and without trying to confirm the actual amount you'll get.  Can you say "scam"?

Review.Titre: I have used hablamexico.com to recharge …
Review.Contenu: I have used hablamexico.com to recharge my girlfriends phone she lives in Tijuana Mexico, I order a $15.00UDS recharge hablamexico.com sends me an invoice with the recharge amount plus the processing fee and the amount sent to the device in Mexico witch is a telcel device, I was charged a total of $17.40 and they were supposed to credit my girlfriends device with $583.07 pesos BUT THEY ONLY CREDITED HER $309.00 I did contacted hablamexico.com via chat, they told me that telcel confirmed the transaction and if there was any issues with the balance to contact, tell, I did and I was told by telcel that there is no way they will credit $583.07 with a $15.00 USD recharge, so this has happen to me twice already, I do have the invoices and there is a BLATANT FRAUD just imagine how many millions of people are been ripped off, when hablamexico.com tells you they will give you $583.07 and their affiliate only gives you $309.00pesos there is a difference of $274.07 pesos, so far they have ripped me off with $548.14 Mexican pesos on 2 transactions I can assure you that I will never use you service anymore and I will file a complaint with the CONSUMERS AFFAIRS DIVISION this fraud has to stop, I am sure is not only me who they are defrauding they are doing it with millions of people.

4star very goodI am

I reload my Telcel phone with this app since I can never get the MiTelcel app to work. I never had an issue with loading the Telcel paquete Amigo. What I don't like is for the Saldo Amigo they state an amount in US dollars and Mexican pesos equivalent, and so my math is thinking they are giving me a really good exchange rate. I believe their website shows Monto Recibido: 1500 MXN; Cantidad Recargada: $50. I think this is misleading since I received 885.47 MXN for my $50 USD.Thankfully I live 30 mins away from Mexico and I can just go on the weekend and reload at an OXXO or Soriana, but just beware that you don't get what it shows on their site. I did reach out to their customer service asking for an explanation and checking if it was a currency exchange that changed that amount. Their response was: Telcel Saldo Amigo Mexico have confirmed that order  XXXXX was placed [date] at [time] for a mobile recharge has been successfully processed and the credit has ben added to the phone number you chose - XXXXXXXXXXXXX. [...] Please keep in mind that any dues owed on the account can affect the current balance. [...]I had no past due balance. Telcel Amigo is a prepaid service. I don't understand the discrepancy. I would still use this website to reload the Telcel Paquete Amigo but not the Saldo Amigo.

Review.Titre: I accidentally wrote the wrong number
Review.Contenu: I accidentally wrote the wrong number. Called customer service and told me there was nothing they can do.

One thing I don’t like it is that several times, while I was placing a call, I am being disconnected and the message “please dial the number you want to call” is played. I try placing my call again and I keep getting the same error. Finally after about three attempts my call goes thru.NOTE: The error described above does not happen ofthen but when it happens it is really annoying.

Review.Titre: Three times I have updated my Telcel…
Review.Contenu: Three times I have updated my Telcel data plan using HablaMexico. The first two times, I had problems getting my credit card authorized. After the first time, I was told it wouldn't happen again, and then it did happen again the second time. Each time, I had to call their office and get it sorted out. I almost gave up on them, but the third time it worked immediately, as it was supposed to.

Review.Titre: Good pricing, but difficult customer service.
Review.Contenu: HablaMexico has good pricing, but I found it difficult to work with the customer's service department. I used to be a "monthly unlimited" customer, but started having two withdrawals per month made to my account. Customer service denied my claim even after emailing screen shots of my bank account. I still use the service, but I won't subscribe to their unlimited service (where they can auto deduct money from my account).

Review.Titre: Great to be able to load time on my…
Review.Contenu: Great to be able to load time on my Telcel phone while in Canada, Mexico or the States. HablaMexico is a great service. Unlimited Facebook and WhatsApp. I simply cannot find this anywhere else.

This has been very simple to use and we are able to load the phone with ease.One suggestion is for the telecom pack - put your price with a check box with the different packs.
